text: Kubera ihinduka ryo kuva ku metero amajana ane baja ku metero amajana umunani, umuvuduko ntuba ugikenewe cane ahubwo haba hakenewe kwihangana hanyuma ukagumizako.
Tereza akajisho ku rubuga rwabo canke kw'idirisha ry'aho bakorera, urabe ingendo bahayanisha.
Igisagara ca Vatikani igife abantu bababa 800 bakibamwo. Nico gihugu gito ca mbere c’igenga kw'isi kandi nico gihugu gifise abantu bake.
Ubushakashatsi bwa Hershey na Chase ni kimwe muntererazo zerekanye ko ADN ari selile ikoze umuntu.
Amazinga ya Cook ni igihugu co mu mazi gifitaniye na Nouvelle Zélande ubucuti burimwo ukwidegemvya, kikaba kiri muri Polynésie, hagati mw'ibahari Pasifike yo mu Bumanuko.
Ushaka kumenya ingene batera ako gakoni kagenda kakakugaruka mu kuboko kwawe, raba neza ko ufise agakoni kabishoboye.
Inkino za ski z'ahashunguruka zatanguye n'imiburiburi mu kinjana ca 17. Mu 1861 Abanyanoroveje baruguruye ishirahamwe rya mbere ry'ivya ski yo kwinezereza muri Ositaraliya.
N'imwe mubibanza vy'iratiro bikomeye muri Afrika y'Epfo kandi ifatwa nk'ubwato kizigenza bwa South African National Parks (SANParks).
Umuziki ukunze gukorwa hakoreshejwe mudasobwa zihanitse mu gutunganya no kuvanga amajwi.
Nk’akarorero, umuntu yoshobora kuvuga ko umuduga utuma hategerezwa kubaho iterambere ry’amabarabara.
Amakamyo atagikoreshwa ni yo bikozeko mu kuzibira ubwinjiriro bw'inzira za gariyamoshi zica mu kuzimu kandi hari abapolisi 80 basaba abatwara imodoka guca mu zindi nzira.
Dogiteri Tony Moll yubuye ico Gituntu kitumva imiti na gato (XDR-TB) mu gace ko muri Afirika y´epho ka KwaZulu-Natal.
Jenerali James Ewing yari gufata abagwanyi 700 akajabuka uruzi mu gace ka Trenton Ferry, agaca acunga ikiraro cahitwa Assunpink Creek agaca acunga ntihagire umwansi arengana.
Ijambo safari rirakunda gukoreshwa bashaka kuvuga ingendo zo hasi zo kuraba ibikoko bitangaje vyo muri Afrika, canecane mw'ishamba ry'umukenke.
MetroRail ifise ubwoko bubiri bw'ivyicaro mu magariyamoshi yunguruza abakozi i Cape Town no mu micungararo yaho: MetroPlus (ari wo Mugwi wa mbere) na Metro (ari wo Mugwi wa gatatu).
Selile iva mw’ijambo ry'ikilatini cella risigura icumba gito.
Ubwonko nibwo butuma umuntu aguma abaho, mu kurungika ububasha mu mubiri wose, ivyo navyo bigatua amaraso aguma atembere atakiyabujije.
Amaroyi ni uruvange rw'ivyuma bibiri canke vyinshi. Ntiwibagire ko hari ibintu vyinshi mu kibaho kivuga ivyuma biri kwisi
Muri iki kiganiro, habonetsemwo cane amajwi y'abakinyi basanzwe bataragera kure baba Texas yo mubuseruko.
Mu kiganiro, yavuze ko ubwo bwoko bushasha bwari "buvurugana cane birenze bunateje uruhagarara kubera urugero runini cane rw´abo buhitana."
Ibice 34% vyabantu babajijwe babibona kumwe, bipfuza ko umwamikazi Elizabeth II yoba uwanyuma kungoma ya cami muri Ostraliya.
Urugendo rw'umusi umwe ni ugutambuka ahareha na mayiri imwe canke nyinshi woshobora kugenda mu musi umwe.
Inkino zo gushunguruka, izirimwo ski n'urwitwa snowboard, ni inkino zikundwa aho abantu bagenda baranyerera ahantu hari ibibarafu bambaye ibirato vya ski canke ivyitwa surf.
Dufatiye kuri aya magufa, bisigura ko iri hinduka ari iryakera cane kuruta uko vyerekanwa n’ibilenyetso vya molekile.
Iyo mutemberereye i Greenland mubihe vy' ubukonje (ariko iyo uduze m' uburaruko, niko hakanya), ni vyiza kwitwaza impuzu zishusha bikwiye.
Uburyo bworoshe cane bwo gutangura mw'icuruzwa ry'inyandiko zerekeye ingendo ni ukwerekana ubuhinga bwanyu ku rukuta ngurukana bumenyi rwerekeye ingendo rusanzwe ruhari.
Bisubiye, amategeko y' akarere ntangaruka afise na nto kukwimura kutemewe n' amategeko; iyimurwa igiharuro kukindi giharuro rya disike rikora neza ku cuma icarico cose aho icakame gikora.
Iyi ngwara ikwiragizwa n'ingurube, igaca yimukira mu bantu biciye mu mibu.
Bisa n’ivyumba. Niwe muntu wa mbere yabonye selile zapfuye.
Igisagara ca Beijing mu Bushinwa kizokwakira Inkino za Olempike zo mu rushana mu 2022, kikazoba kibaye igisagara ca mbere cakiriye inkino za Olempike zo mu ci n'izo mu rushana.
Ikiraro c' Uruzi rwa Oyapock ni ikiraro gifashwe n' imigozi. Gica Kuruzi Oyapock kugira gihuze ibisagara vya Oiapoque muri Brazil hamwe na Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock i Guiana y'ubu Faransa.
Abantu benshi baribikira ibibanza imbere neza y' igihe (kuberako amato aba yuzuye mugihe ca benshi).
Amahoteli yitwa auberges kenshi aha indaro abakiri bato, canecane abafise imyaka iri hagati ya mirongibiri na mirongitatu. Mugabo kenshi urahasanga n'abakuze.
Nyinshi mu nsengero zaho ziragira Isabukuru itangura muri Munyonyo ikarangira hagati muri Rusama, bikavana n'ikirangamisi c'umwaka ca buri rusengero.
Hari abahinga biyumvira ko ivyo bikoko vyitwa tricératops vyarya ibimera vyitwa cycades vyari bigwiriye mu kiringo citwa crétacé.
Isaha 11:20, igipolisi caciye gisaba abari mu myiyerekano kwigirwa inyuma ku mapave, kibabwira yuko naho bafise uburenganzira bwo kugira imyiyerekano, batozibira uruja n'uruza.
Izindi nkino za ski zizobera ku kibuga ca ski citwa Taizicheng i Zhangjiakou, nko ku bilometero 220 (mayiri 140) uvuye i Beijing.
Uwo wese ategekanya kuja mu gihugu gishobora kubonwa nk'ikirimwo intambara akwiye gutegurwa n'abahinga bavyo.

Ikigendajuru kizunguruka kitagira umudereva citwa Chandrayaan-1 cararekuye icuma kigira ubushakashatsi ku kwezi (MIP), gikubita hejuru y’ukwezi ku muvuduko w'ikilometero 1,5 kw'isegonda (mayiri 3000 kw'isaha), gihagarara neza hafi y'isonga ry'epfo ry’ukwezi.
Vyongeye, mu mihingo ishushe usanga udukoko dutera indwara tugwira ningoga tukanaramba tutari mu mubiri.
Rimwerimwe ingendo zo mu kirere z'ubuhinga zirinjira i musozi, mu ntumbero yo gukora imyimenyerezo yo kuduga imisozi canke kugira bashike kw’isonga ry’isi, iryo na ryo rikaba rifise icicariro kinini.
Iki kinyabuzima (algae) gikora ubumara bushobora guhagarika imitsi yaba ku bantu no ku mafi.

Ico kiringo c'Ubwami butatu ni kimwe mu vyasesetsemwo amaraso menshi cane muri kahise k'Ubushinwa bwa kera. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barapfuye bariko barwanira intebe y'ubwami iruta izindi zose ku kirimba gihambaye c'i Xi’an.
Iyo mwururutse ubwato mukoresheje ingendo shuri gusa ntimuzoba mukeneye viza itandukanye (guhera 2009).
Ico kintu catowe kiradufasha gutahura ingene ihindagurika ry'amoya y'inyoni ryabaye.
Abarwayi bamwe boshobora kuba banduriye ako gakoko mu bitaro, Niko Dogiteri Moll avyibaza, kandi n´imiburiburi babiri bari abajejwe amagara y´abantu.
Ugishika mu mahanga, abantu bashobora kuba barakwihanganira bakanagutahura kubera bazi ko ingenzi ziba zitaramenyera ico gihugu gishasha.
Vyongeye, gusaka abantu ku birindiro vy'umutekano vyararushirije gukara kuva ku wa 11 Nyakanga 2001.
Ubu abantu bandika ubutumwa bakoresheje mudasobwa zabo, ntibagishaka gukoresha isongozo.
Abashakashatsi bavuga ko naho uwo murizo ari uwa dinozoro ikiri nto, ivyo barabiyeko vyerekena amoya akuze, si utwoya tw'igiswi.
Urugero rwa pH rwerekanwa n'urugero rw'ama ions ya Idrojene (H muri pH) mukinyaburozi cageragejwe.
Ikibabaje, iyo ukoze DVD, impera zayo kenshi ziba zikase na zo nyene, kandi igihe iyo reresi ifise amajambo yanditswemwo ayisigura yegereye cane hasi, ntaba akibonetse yose.
Nta guteba gutewe n'imiduga myinshi kwavuzwe ko kwabaye mw'ibarabara rizigura abo mu gisagara bashobora kwikorako.
Haca hakurikira ibikoko vyo mu bwoko bw'inyabu bifise ubunini bugereranye birya ibikoko bigereranye kuva ku nkwavu gushika ku mpongo.
Hemejwe ko imbata batoye kuwa mbere yapfuye, mu mwonga uri iruhande y’igisagra ca Lyon mu burengero bw’ubufaransa, yari yanduye Ubwoko bw’akamangu kica abantu, H5N1.
Inzira z’imikogote zatangujwe kera kugirango ziyifate neza. Mu nyuma zaho niho habonetse ko vyoba vyiza bashizemwo icuma hejuru.
Ikimenyetso ca mbere c’uburozi ni nko kubona icupa ry’umuti ryuguruye canke icupa ry’iyindi miti umuntu akoresha munzu ariko yica.
Ibi bitanga akaryo keza ko kubona aurores boréales, kuko ikirere kizoba cijimye cane canke bukebuke ugereranije n'isaha.
Uravye ingene Tirikiya ingana, ni co gihugu kigira 37 kw'isi mu bunini, kikaba kigomba kungana n'akarere nyamukuru k'Ubufaransa n'aka Royaume-Uni ubifatiye hamwe.
Uwahoze ari umuvugizi wa Leta Newt Gingrich yabaye uwakane, Buramatari wa Texas Rick Perry aba uwagatanu nayo umushingamateka Michele Bachmann aba uwa gatandatu.
Archipelago iri kubiro metero 120 m' uburaruko bwa Peninsula. Rinini ni izinga ry' Umwami George hamwe n' ikigwati ca Villa Las Estrellas.
Perezida wa Amerika George W.Bush yakiriye neza itangazo.
Hari insiguro nyinshi cane gose zishoboka, gusa iki gisigara arico abantu benshi baba bashatse gusigura iyo bavuze "kuja i Disney World".
Ubutaliyano bwari bugamije ahanini ibihugu vyo muri Afrika. Kugira bubifate, bokeneye kuba bafise ahantu inteko zitera zivuye, kugira zijabuke Ikiyaga Mediterane maze zitere Afrika.
Umurwi waza ubwambere ku rutonde rw'ihiganwa wa Afirika y’epfo watanguye neza mu gutsinda bitagoranye 26 - 00 umurwi wa Zambiya waza ubwa 5 ku rutonde.
Mu ngendeshwa, bajabutse basubira i Paris bakikujwe n'igitero c'abantu bakoma induru bagira n'iterabwoba ku Mwami n'Umwamikazi.
Amir Khan, uwatahukanye umudari w'ifeza mu Nkino za Olempike mu 2004, yavuze ati: "Ku bwanje, abagore ntibatari bakwiye kurwana. Ni co ciyumviro canje."
I Beijing ni ho hazobera ibirori vyo gutangura n'ivyo gusozera, hamwe n'inkino zibera ku bibarafu indani mu nyubakwa zabigenewe.
Ico ciyumviro kiravuguruza ibivugwa ko ata bintu bibera mu butaka bw'ukwezi.
Hariho ibintu vyinshi bitandukanye bigize amaso, ivyo navyo bivana bigenda bigorana bivanye nico umubiri usaba.
Mu bijanye n'izo ngendo, akarere kitwa Schengen gatuma ivyo bihugu bimera nk'igihugu kimwe.
Mu myaka yose ya 1960, Brzezinski yari umuhanuzi wa John F. Kennedy, mu nyuma akora ku ntwaro ya Lyndon B. Johnson.
Mu 1957, Luxembourg yabaye kimwe mu bihugu vyatanguje ishirahamwe ubu ryitwa Ishirahamwe ry'Abanyaburaya.
Inkuru yatanzwe muri opera y’Abafaransa, yanditswe na Camille Saint-Saens, ni iy'umunyatugenegene "ubuzima bwiwe bugizwe no gukunda ibiyayuramutwe no gukunda Ubuyapani."
Inyuma yo gutsindwa mu ntambara za mbere, Ethelred yarashoboye kwumvikana na Olaf, uwo na we aca asubira muri Noroveji kugerageza guhabuza ingoma yiwe, rimwerimwe atsinda ikindi gihe na ho atsindwa.
Vyihuse, yaciye yungururizwa mubitaro vyitwa Addenbrooke biri muri Cambridge.
Igihe c'ingenzi mu mahuriro yo mu misozi mu bisanzwe gishika kw'isonga mu gihe c'ici ry'Abahindi.
Abandi bashira izinga rya Livingston, hamwe na Deception aho ibinogo vyatewe n'ikirunga kikiruka kigize icambu kama gitamarirwa.

Ubwa kabiri hari mw'ihiganwa ryitwa Slalom géant, aho yarangije mu kibanza ca cumi mu mugwi w’abagore basiganwa bicaye. Yamaze umwanya w'iminota 4:41.30, akaba yacerewe iminota 2:11.60 ugereranije n'uwahejeje mukibanza ca mbere w'umunya Otrishe yitwa Claudia Loesch, acerwa n'umunota 1:09.02 ugereranije n'uwahejeje mu kibanza c'icenda Dani wo muri Hongiriya.
Murray yatakaje igice ca mbere bamaze kunganya 6-6. Muri ico gice, umwe wese muri bo yari yagumye atsinda igihe yaba ari we atanguye gutera.
Ijwi hamwe n' umuco bikorerwa kuri piramide ni kimwe mubintu binezereza cane mu karere ku bana.
Kuberako isuzumwa ry' inyambukira ridahari canke vyo guhuma amaso iyo mushitse mugihugu canyu c' amavuko, isuzumwa kuri customs rishobora kuba ikibazo.
Iyo muri mubiruhuko, muba mufise umwanya wo kwinezereza hamwe nogufata iyi minota yo guteka ikintu kidasanzwe.
Atome zimwe zimwe zifise intimbatimba itaguma hamwe, ibi bisigura ko zikunda gutandukana zidakozweko canke zikozweko bukebuke.
Mw'itangazo yashikirije ku wa mungu amasaha yitereye, Prezida wa Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika yamenyesheje biciye ku muvugizi wiwe yuko inteko z'ico gihugu zizova muri Siriya.
Ikigendajuru mw'isanzure cakira ihamagarwa, hama kikarisubiza inyuma, nk'icarimwe.
Uwundi Mugiriki rurangiranwa ni wa muhinga mu biharuro Pythagore, azwi canecane kubera iciyumviro yashitseko kijanye n'amasano ari hagati y'impande z'inyabutatu y'imfuruka ngororotsi.
Abantu bamwe bibazako yari afise ukuri ariko abandi nabo bibaza ibitandukanye ; ko ukwezi kuzunguruka iruhande y’isi, harimwo n’izuba(mbere harimwo n’inyeyeri).

Mu bisanzwe kazino nta ko zitagira ngo zungukire cane ku mwanya abajayo bahamara no ku mahera yabo. Kenshi usanga ata madirisha canke amasaha yo ku ruhome bihari, n'imiryango isohoka ikaba igoye gutora.
Mu mugwi w’amazinga no mu biyaga, ntibikenewe cane gukoresha ubwato bunini.
Mu ci, na cane cane, uzokenera kumera amagabo wirinda imibu ni wahitamwo kuyerera mw'ishamba ry'imvura.
Iyo sinema yarimwo Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone yararaswe mu zotorwa, mu mice yose ihambaye.
Bifata nk'igice c'isaha kugira utembere ico kigwati gitangaje.
Inyenyeri zitanga umuco n'ubushuhe kubera inguvu zikozwe iyo atome za idrojene ziteranijwe (canke zishongesherejwe) hamwe kugira bikore ibintu biremereye gusumba.
Mu 1995, yatowe ko ari umukinyi wakarorero wa Partizan muri kahise.
Gukangagurika ni harya uvyuka wabitegekanije mu gihe uba uryamye bisanzwe hama ugasubira gusinzina haheze akanya gato (iminota 10-60).
Mudasobwa uyumunsi zikoreshwa mu gukora amashusho n’amasanamu agenda.
Muri Rogaland no muri Agder kenshi vyitwa "hei" bisigura itongo ritagiramwo ibiti ry'ikirarane kenshi ryiganziwe n'ivyatsi bitukura.
Kumatohoza yimbitse, ibice 29 kw'ijana vy'abantu babajijwe biyumvira ko Ostraliya yoba republika mu maguru masha, mugihe ibindi bice 31% vyabantu biyumvira ko Ostraliya itokwigera iba repubilika.
